name: react-native-escpos-printer
description: React Native ESC/POS printer module supporting network, bluetooth, usb, serial; text/barcode/qr/image printing.

scripts.copy-js: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const src='src/drivers/imin-printer-rn.js'; const dst='dist/drivers/imin-printer-rn.js'; if(fs.existsSync(src)) {fs.copyFileSync(src, dst); console.log('✅ JS文件复制完成');} else {console.log('⚠️  源文件不存在');}"
